Kabiru Rabiu (amụrụ na 28 Nọvemba 1980) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria ma na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi otu BUA Group. N'afọ 2020, a kpọrọ ya onye ndu akụ na ụba Afrịka kachasị mma n'okpuru afọ iri anọ na 100 African Economic Leaders for Tomorrow awards site n'aka French Institut Choiseu

Rabiu nwetara nzere bachelọ na njikwa na Webster University, London ma nwee nzere masta ya na American Intercontinental University na London. Rabiu malitere ọrụ ya na Universal Rice Mills ma mesịa sonye na Nigeria Oil Mills Limited ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka General Manager ma mesịa bụrụ General Manager
N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke BUA Oil Mills Limited
N'afọ 2010, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke BUA Group
Kabiru bụ onye guzobere Hollaport (ngwaọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ na ozi).
